homeHeader.title: Design Your Prototype, Collaborate With Industry Leaders, & Launch Innovative Tech Solutions in DTEC Free Zone
homeHeader.description: From licensing restrictions to limited office space and visa caps, navigating DTEC business setup independently can stall your business momentum. At One Nexuz, our experts streamline setup and operations, so you can focus on growth. Fuel limitless business growth from the UAE's leading startup hub, boasting an innovative digital infrastructure, cutting-edge co-working spaces, custom-built mentorship programs, and exciting investor networking programs.

leftSection_5.title: Start Operating in DTEC Free Zone in 6 Easy Steps

items.title: Define Your Business Scope
items.description: We’ll kick off with a free consultation to discuss your business goals and choose the best-fit business activity and structure.

items.title: Secure a Business Name
items.description: Next, we’ll assist you in creating, submitting, and registering a unique trade name compliant with the DED requirements.

items.title: Prepare Your Application
items.description: We’ll help you compile the necessary documents, fill out the licensing application, and submit it to the UAE DIEZ Authority.

items.title: Pay Your Fees
items.description: Our expert business consultants will pay your registration and licensing fees on your behalf to fast-track licensing.

items.title: Launch Your Business
items.description: Once approved, we'll issue your trade license alongside registration documents and send it to your preferred address.

items.title: Open a Free Zone Account
items.description: Lastly, our specialists will assist you in opening a personal or corporate bank account to simplify business financing.

faq.title: Clear Answers, Expert Insights, Hassle Free Consulting Experience

items.question: Is DTEC a dedicated Free Zone in Dubai?
items.answer: No, DTEC is not a separate Free Zone in Dubai, rather it’s a campus within the Dubai Silicon Oasis Free Zone

items.question: How long does it take to set up a business in DTEC?
items.answer: Generally, it takes 1-14 days to secure a license and register your company in DTEC Free Zone.

items.question: What legal structures can I choose in DTEC?
items.answer: The DTEC offers four primary business structures, including Free Zone Company, Free Zone Establishment, Branch of a Foreign Company, and Branch of a UAE Company.

items.question: Do I need a physical office to launch by DTEC business?
items.answer: No, DTEC offers alternative options, including flexi-desk, virtual, and co-working spaces, empowering you to cut costs.

items.question: Does One Nexuz help open a corporate bank account in DTEC?
items.answer: Yes, our skilled PRO specialists can help you secure first-time approvals for personal or business accounts in DSO Free Zone.
